existing_features.title: Extend the hero theme particle effect type options so admins can select additional particle types beyond the current set, and persist the chosen type as part of `HeroSectionTheme.particleEffect.effectType`.

Update the Admin Hero Theme Manager particle type selector to include the newly added particle effect types, with clear English labels, and ensure the currently saved type is correctly shown/selected when reloading the admin page.

Implement distinct canvas rendering behaviors in `ParticleEffectLayer` for all particle types that are selectable in the admin UI, including the existing options that are currently not visually distinct (e.g., `confetti`, `stethoscopeParticles`, `crossParticles`) and the newly added types.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add more particle types as selectable options in the hero section theme.

projectName: Add additional selectable particle types for the Hero theme
